text: haey yeung ban bratan ai sha k ning yea k kau b aoy keat . haey yeung ban bangkeut nowknong pouchopongsa robsa keat chea na pi ning( yeung ban banhchouh) kompir . haey yeung ban bratan aoy keat nouv rongvean robsa keat now knong lokey nih (phriyea ning kaunchaw) . haey pitabrakd nasa now thngai barlok keat nung sthet knongchamnaom anak del la troemotrauv
